text.0: not one of you ye gods is small none of you is a feeble child.
text.1: all of you verily are great.
text.2: thus be ye lauded ye destroyers of the foe ye threeandthirty deities.
text.3: the gods of man the holy ones.
text.4: as such defend and succour us with benedictions speak to us.
text.5: lead us not from our fathers and from manus path into the distance far away.
text.6: ye deities who stay with us and all ye gods of all mankind.
text.7: give us your wide protection give shelter for cattle and for steed.
